#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

long unsigned int d(long unsigned int no)
{
long unsigned int sum=0;
while(no != 0)
     {
     if((no%10)%2==0)
       sum = sum + (no%10)*2;
     else
       sum = sum + no%10;
     no/=10;
     }
return sum%10;
}

long unsigned int c(long unsigned int no)
{
long unsigned int sum=0;
while(no%10 != 0)
     sum = sum + d(--no);
return sum + 45*(no/10);
}

int main()
{
int t;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{
long unsigned int a,b,sum;
cin>>a>>b;
sum=c(b+1)-c(a);
cout<<sum<<endl;
}
return 0;
}
